channel.title: How to let new players choose thier look help
channel.description: Is there a code that lets new players in the server pick what they want to look when they get to the server?

item.title: How to let new players choose thier look help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“angel-in-war, post:9, topic:252204”]Add this in client.java

if (FirstLog == 0) { FirstLog = 1; showInterface(3559); } public int FirstLog = 0;[/quote]
Yeah, that works, except that when they log out and back in it will be reset to 0 rendering it useless.

Read full topic
item.source: How to let new players choose thier look help

item.title: How to let new players choose thier look help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“angel-in-war, post:9, topic:252204”]Add this in client.java

if (FirstLog == 0) { FirstLog = 1; showInterface(3559); } public int FirstLog = 0;[/quote]

Then everytime they logged in the ‘Change your character’s look’ screen would show up. You can make it check for the experience given upon first login and edit it to only show then instead of saving a useless integer.

Read full topic
item.source: How to let new players choose thier look help

item.title: How to let new players choose thier look help

if (FirstLog == 0) { FirstLog = 1; showInterface(3559); } public int FirstLog = 0;

add this :
if(FirstTimeLogin == 0){
showInterface(3559);
}

u need to add a few more things but if you know how to code you can end i am to lazy
[/quote]
ur not lazy u just know not to spoonfeed (if thst was the joke sorry i ruined it)[/quote]

thats how you learn to code … when i ask a question nobody knows it always need to search ir for myself end i am pretty happy i do it like this becaus this give me alot more xp
